name: noise_reduction
description: Reduce background noise from an audio recording using spectral gating. Works best on recordings with steady-state noise (hiss, hum, fan noise).

strength.description: Noise reduction strength 0.0-1.0 (default: 0.5). Higher = more aggressive.

noise_profile_seconds.description: Seconds of audio from the start to use as noise profile (default: 0.5). Use a quiet section.
